title: Definitions and basic properties for groups

blocks.name: cgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all group operations.
blocks.origin: const class cgr { GrpOp }

blocks.name: diff.cgr.s
diff.cgr.c
diff.cgr.w
cgi
blocks.content: Extend class notation with a function mapping a group operation to the group's identity element.
blocks.origin: const class cgi { GId }

blocks.name: diff.cgi.s
diff.cgi.c
diff.cgi.w
cgn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with a function mapping a group operation to the inverse function for the group.
blocks.origin: const class cgn { inv }

diff.cgn.c
diff.cgn.w

df-grpo
blocks.content: Define the class of all group operations. The base set for a group can be determined from its group operation. Based on the definition in Exercise 28 of [Herstein] p. 54. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-grpo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cgr, cab(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s0), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))))))), wrex(s5, cv(s1), wral(s2, cv(s1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s5))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-grpo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ GrpOp = { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1,((s0 :(s1 √ó s1)‚Üí s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s2[s0]s3)[s0]s4)=(s2[s0](s3[s0]s4)))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s5 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1,((s5[s0]s2)= s2 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s3[s0]s2)= s5))))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-gid
blocks.content: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's identity element. (Contributed by FL, 5-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ginv
blocks.content: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's inverse function. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-gdiv
blocks.content: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's division (or subtraction) operation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isgrpo
blocks.content: The predicate "is a group operation." Note that ` X ` is the base set of the group. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isgrpoi
blocks.content: Properties that determine a group operation. Read ` N ` as ` N ( x ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrpoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wcel(c0, cgr)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1)
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  -| wcel(c2, c1)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c3, c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wcel(c0, cgr), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wrex(hs0, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))))
  rgen3(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  mp2an(wrex(hs0, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  rgen(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(co(c3, c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  rspcev(s1, c3, c1, wceq(co(c3, c0, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2, co(c3, c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  oveq1(cv(s1), c3, c0, cv(s0))
  rspcev(hs0, c2, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2)))), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0, cv(s0))
  rexbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))

thm isgrpoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà GrpOp
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ (c0 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí c1)

  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà c1
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[c0]s0)= s0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c3[c0]s0)= c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

} = {
  mpbir3an(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, (c0 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= hs0)))))

  mp2an(‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= hs0)))), c2 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((c2[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2))))
  rgen(s0, c1, ((c2[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2)))

  syl2anc(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2), c3 ‚àà c1, (c3[c0]s0)= c2)
  rspcev(s1, c3, c1, (c3[c0]s0)= c2, (s1[c0]s0)= c2)

  oveq1(s1, c3, c0, s0)
  rspcev(hs0, c2, c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((c2[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= hs0))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c2, ((hs0[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= hs0)), ((c2[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, (hs0[c0]s0)= s0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= hs0), (c2[c0]s0)= s0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2))
  eqeq1d((hs0[c0]s0), s0, (c2[c0]s0), hs0 = c2)

  mp2an(c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí c1), (c1 √ó c1)‚àà ùïå)
  xpex(c1, c1)

  isgrpo(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c0, universe, c1)

  rgen(s0, c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s0 =(s1[c0]s2))))
  mpdan(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s0 =(s1[c0]s2))), s0 =(c2[c0]s0))
  eqcomd(s0, (c2[c0]s0), s0 ‚àà c1)
  mp3an1(s0 ‚àà c1, s0 =(c2[c0]s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s0 =(s1[c0]s2))), c2 ‚àà c1)
  rspceov(s1, s2, c2, c1, s0, c1, s0, c0)
  foov(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c1, c1)

  diff.co.s(s1, c3, c0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((c2[c0]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c0]s0)= c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

thm grpolidinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  simp3d(wcel(c0, cgr), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(hs0))))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, co(cv(s2), c0, cv(hs0))))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))
  isgrpo(s1, s2, hs0, s0, c0, cgr, c1)

thm gidval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cgi, c0), crio(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cgi, c0), crio(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cgi, c0), crio(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cgi, crio(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), crio(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  riotaeqbidv(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))

  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))

  df-gid(hs0, s0, s1)

thm gidval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(GId ` c0)= iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(GId ` c0)= iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))), d(s0, c2))

  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (GId ` c0)= iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cgi, iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), iota(s0 ‚àà ran(hs0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))))
  riotaeqbidv(s0, ran(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))
  raleqbidv(s1, ran(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, ((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1), ((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))
  syl6eqr(ran(hs0), c2, ran(c0), hs0 = c0)
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1)= s1, (s1[hs0]s0)= s1, (s0[c0]s1)= s1, (s1[c0]s0)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s0[hs0]s1), s1, (s0[c0]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  eqeq1d((s1[hs0]s0), s1, (s1[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  df-gid(hs0, s0, s1)
  riotaex(s0, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))))

  riotabidva(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cgr), wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))

  rgenw(s0, c2, wi(wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  ralimi(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  simpl(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))

thm grpoidval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 = iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(GId ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 = iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 = iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))), d(s1, c1))
  syl5eq(c1, iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)), (GId ` c0), c0 ‚àà GrpOp)
  eqtr4d((GId ` c0), iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)), iota(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), c0 ‚àà GrpOp)
  gidval(s0, s1, c0, cgr, c2)
  riotabidva(s0, c2, c0 ‚àà GrpOp, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, s0 ‚àà c2, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))‚àß ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))))
  3jca(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))))
  rgenw(s0, c2, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1)))
  ralimi(s1, c2, ((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1), (s0[c0]s1)= s1)
  simpl((s0[c0]s1)= s1, (s1[c0]s0)= s1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]s1)= s0 ‚àß(s1[c0]hs0)= s0))))))
  grpoidinv(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  reximi(s0, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]s1)= s0 ‚àß(s1[c0]hs0)= s0)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))
  ralimi(s1, c2, (((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]s1)= s0 ‚àß(s1[c0]hs0)= s0))), ((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1))
  simpl(((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]s1)= s0 ‚àß(s1[c0]hs0)= s0)))
  grpoideu(s0, s1, c0, c2)
  reupick2(s0, c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c0]s0)= s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)= s1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgr)
  diff.cgr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: grpoidcl
blocks.content: The identity element of a group belongs to the group. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpoidcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, c2, crio(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  grpoidval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  syl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(crio(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))), c2), wreu(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))))
  grpoideu(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  riotacl(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)

  ‚ä£ c1 =(GId ` c0)
} = {

blocks.name: grpoinveu
blocks.content: The left inverse element of a group is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(b) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm grpoinveu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wreu(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wreu(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3)), wa(wa(wceq(co(c3, c0, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(s0)), c3)))))
  grpoidinv2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(wa(wceq(co(c3, c0, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(s0)), c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3)))
  reximi(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3))
  simpl(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(s0)), c3))
  reximdva(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  ancld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  expd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  an32s(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  imp41(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  com24(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), co(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  eqtr3(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  grporcan(c0, cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0), c1)
  reu8(s0, hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgr)
  diff.cgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm grpoinveu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]c1)= c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(GId ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]c1)= c3), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚Üí s0 = hs0)))))
  mpd((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚Üí s0 = hs0)))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]c1)= c3))
  syl((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]c1)= c3), (((c3[c0]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c0]c3)= c1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(c1[c0]s0)= c3))))
  grpoidinv2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(((c3[c0]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c0]c3)= c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(c1[c0]s0)= c3)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]c1)= c3))
  reximi(s0, c2, ((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(c1[c0]s0)= c3), (s0[c0]c1)= c3)
  simpl((s0[c0]c1)= c3, (c1[c0]s0)= c3)
  reximdva(s0, c2, (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (s0[c0]c1)= c3, ((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚Üí s0 = hs0))))
  ancld(((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), (s0[c0]c1)= c3, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚Üí s0 = hs0)))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c2, ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), (s0[c0]c1)= c3, ((hs0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  expd((((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (s0[c0]c1)= c3, (hs0[c0]c1)= c3, s0 = hs0)
  an32s((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), s0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c2, (((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]c1)= c3)‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  imp41(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2, (((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]c1)= c3)‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  com24(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2, (((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]c1)= c3)‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  3exp2(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, s0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, (((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]c1)= c3)‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  syl5ib((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)), ((s0[c0]c1)= c3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]c1)= c3), s0 = hs0, (s0[c0]c1)=(hs0[c0]c1))
  eqtr3((s0[c0]c1), c3, (hs0[c0]c1))
  grporcan(c0, s0, c2, hs0, c1)
  reu8(s0, hs0, c2, (s0[c0]c1)= c3, (hs0[c0]c1)= c3)
  eqeq1d((s0[c0]c1), c3, (hs0[c0]c1), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgr)
  diff.cgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.w((s0[c0]c1)= c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs0[c0]c1), c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: grpoid
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that an element of a group is the identity element. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpoid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, c0))
} = {
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  pm2.43d(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  mpid(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpoidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  grporcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1)
  eqeq2d(co(c1, c0, c1), co(c3, c0, c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  grpolid(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

thm grpoid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 = c3 ‚Üî(c1[c0]c1)= c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(GId ` c0)
} = {
  bitr3d((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c1 = c3, (c1[c0]c1)= c1, (c1[c0]c1)=(c3[c0]c1))
  imp(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c0]c1)=(c3[c0]c1)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  pm2.43d(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c0]c1)=(c3[c0]c1)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  mpid(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c1[c0]c1)=(c3[c0]c1)‚Üî c1 = c3)), c3 ‚àà c2)
  grpoidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  3exp2(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c0]c1)=(c3[c0]c1)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  grporcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1)
  eqeq2d((c1[c0]c1), (c3[c0]c1), c1, (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  grpolid(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: grporn
blocks.content: The range of a group operation. Useful for satisfying group base set hypotheses of the form ` X = ran G ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grporn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, crn(c1))
  -| wcel(c1, cgr)
  -| wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c0, c0))
} = {
  mp2an(wceq(c0, crn(c1)), wfn(c1, cxp(c0, c0)), wfn(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))))
  mpbir2an(wfn(c1, cxp(c0, c0)), wfun(c1), wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c0, c0)))
  mp2b(wfun(c1), wcel(c1, cgr), wfo(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)), crn(c1)))
  fofun(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)), crn(c1))
  df-fn(c1, cxp(c0, c0))
  mp2b(wfn(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))), wcel(c1, cgr), wfo(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)), crn(c1)))
  grpofo(c1, crn(c1))
  eqid(crn(c1))
  fofn(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)), crn(c1))
  sylib(wa(wfn(c1, cxp(c0, c0)), wfn(c1, cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)))), wceq(c0, crn(c1)), wceq(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1))))
  fndmu(c1, cxp(c0, c0), cxp(crn(c1), crn(c1)))
  xpid11(c0, crn(c1))
}

thm grporn(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = ran(c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà GrpOp
  ‚ä£ dom(c1)=(c0 √ó c0)
} = {
  mp2an(c0 = ran(c1), c1[Fn](c0 √ó c0), c1[Fn](ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)))
  mpbir2an(c1[Fn](c0 √ó c0), Fun(c1), dom(c1)=(c0 √ó c0))
  mp2b(Fun(c1), c1 ‚àà GrpOp, (c1 :(ran(c1)√ó ran(c1))‚Ü† ran(c1)))
  fofun(c1, (ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  df-fn(c1, (c0 √ó c0))
  mp2b(c1[Fn](ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)), c1 ‚àà GrpOp, (c1 :(ran(c1)√ó ran(c1))‚Ü† ran(c1)))
  grpofo(c1, ran(c1))
  eqid(ran(c1))
  fofn(c1, (ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  sylib((c1[Fn](c0 √ó c0)‚àß c1[Fn](ran(c1)√ó ran(c1))), c0 = ran(c1), (c0 √ó c0)=(ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)))
  fndmu(c1, (c0 √ó c0), (ran(c1)√ó ran(c1)))
  xpid11(c0, ran(c1))
}

blocks.name: grpoinvfval
blocks.content: The inverse function of a group. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpoinvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))), cfv(cgn, c0), wcel(c0, cgr))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cgr), wceq(cfv(cgn, c0), cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3)))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))), universe))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, crn(c0), wcel(c0, cgr))
  rnexg(c0, cgr)
  mptexg(s0, c2, universe, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3)))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, cgr, cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))), universe, cgn, cmpt(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), crio(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cgi, cv(hs0))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), crio(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)))), c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  riotaeqbidv(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cgi, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))
  syl6eqr(crn(cv(hs0)), c2, crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cgi, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cgi, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cgi)
  df-ginv(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c2, crio(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm grpoinvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3)))

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3))), d(s0, c3))

  syl5eq(c1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3)), (inv ` c0), c0 ‚àà GrpOp)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, (inv ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3)), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3))‚àà ùïå)
  syl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3))‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eqel(c2, universe, ran(c0), c0 ‚àà GrpOp)
  rnexg(c0, cgr)
  mptexg(s0, c2, universe, iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, cgr, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3)), universe, cgn, (s0 ‚àà ran(hs0)‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),(s1[hs0]s0)=(GId ` hs0))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, ran(hs0), iota(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),(s1[hs0]s0)=(GId ` hs0)), c2, iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3), hs0 = c0)
  riotaeqbidv(s1, ran(hs0), c2, hs0 = c0, (s1[hs0]s0)=(GId ` hs0), (s1[c0]s0)= c3)
  syl6eqr(ran(hs0), c2, ran(c0), hs0 = c0)
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  eqeq12d((s1[hs0]s0), (GId ` hs0), (s1[c0]s0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  syl6eqr((GId ` hs0), c3, (GId ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c2,(s1[c0]s0)= c3)))

thm grpoinvval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cgi, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(c3, c1), crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), c1), wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2))
  fveq1d(c3, c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  grpoinvfval(hs0, s0, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4)), crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4)))
  riotabidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4, co(cv(s0), c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0), c0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), c4))))
  riotaex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, c1), c4)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  riotabidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c1, (s0[c0]hs0)= c4, (s0[c0]c1)= c4)
  eqeq1d((s0[c0]hs0), c4, (s0[c0]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, s0, c0)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]hs0)= c4)))
  riotaex(s0, c2, (s0[c0]c1)= c4)

  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgn, c0))

  grpoinvval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crio(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4)), crab(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))), wreu(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4)))
  riotacl2(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))

  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), w3a(wral(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))), wrex(hs0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), wreu(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))), wrex(hs0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4))), wreu(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4))))
  rgenw(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs0)), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, c1), c4)))

thm grpoinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(((c3 ` c1)[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0](c3 ` c1))= c4))

  grpoinvval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), iota(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c0]c1)= c4)‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c2 |(hs0[c0]c1)= c4 }, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c0]c1)= c4))
  riotacl2(hs0, c2, (hs0[c0]c1)= c4)

  sylan((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, ((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚Üî((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)‚Üí(hs0[c0]c1)= c4))‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4))‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c0]c1)= c4)))
  3jca((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)‚Üí(hs0[c0]c1)= c4)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)), ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c0]c1)= c4))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)‚Üí(hs0[c0]c1)= c4)))
  rgenw(hs0, c2, (((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)‚Üí(hs0[c0]c1)= c4))
  simpl((hs0[c0]c1)= c4, (c1[c0]hs0)= c4)
  simprd((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c0]c1)= c4 ‚àß(c1[c0]hs0)= c4)), ((c4[c0]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c0]c4)= c1))

  grporid(c0, c3, c2, c5)
}

blocks.name: grpolcan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for groups. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpolcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  3imp2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  exp53(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1)), co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3))))
  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1)), co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3))))
  oveq2(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3), cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0)
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1)), c1))
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1)), c1))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1)), c1, co(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c1), co(cfv(cgi, c0), c0, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c1, cfv(cgi, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), cfv(cgi, c0)))
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c1))), w3a(wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpoass(c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2, c4, c1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cgi, c0), c0, c1), c1))
  grpolid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c1), co(c4, c0, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3)), c3))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3)), c3))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3)), c3, co(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c3), co(cfv(cgi, c0), c0, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c3, cfv(cgi, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), cfv(cgi, c0)))
  grpolinv(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cgn, c0), cfv(cgi, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, c4), c0, c3), co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c0, co(c4, c0, c3))), w3a(wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2))
  grpoinvcl(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cgn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgn, c0))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpoass(c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2, c4, c3)
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cgi, c0), c0, c3), c3))
  grpolid(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cgi, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c0))
  oveq2(c1, c3, c4, c0)
}

thm grpolcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
} = {
  impbid1((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3), c1 = c3)
  3imp2(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3)‚Üí c1 = c3))
  exp53(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3), c1 = c3)
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1)), (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3)), (((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚àß(c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3)))
  adantl(((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3), (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1))=(((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3)))
  oveq2((c4[c0]c1), (c4[c0]c3), ((inv ` c0)` c4), c0)
  adantr(((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3), (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1))= c1)
  adantrl((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1))= c1)
  3eqtr3d((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1)), c1, ((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)[c0]c1), ((GId ` c0)[c0]c1), ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  oveq1d((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4), c0, c1, (GId ` c0), ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  adantlr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)=(GId ` c0))
  anassrs(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)[c0]c1)=(((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1)))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)[c0]c1)=(((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c1)), (((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  3jca((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  adantrl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2)
  simprr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simprl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpoass(c0, ((inv ` c0)` c4), c2, c4, c1)
  adantr((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2, ((GId ` c0)[c0]c1)= c1)
  grpolid(c0, c1, c2, (GId ` c0))
  adantr(((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c0]c1)=(c4[c0]c3), (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3))= c3)
  adantlr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3))= c3)
  3eqtr3d((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3)), c3, ((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)[c0]c3), ((GId ` c0)[c0]c3), (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  oveq1d((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4), c0, c3, (GId ` c0), (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  adantrl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)=(GId ` c0))
  grpolinv(c0, c4, c2, (inv ` c0), (GId ` c0))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, (c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0]c4)[c0]c3)=(((inv ` c0)` c4)[c0](c4[c0]c3)), (((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3jca((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  adantrl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((inv ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2)
  grpoinvcl(c0, c4, c2, (inv ` c0))
  eqid((inv ` c0))
  simprr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simprl(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpoass(c0, ((inv ` c0)` c4), c2, c4, c3)
  adantrr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((GId ` c0)[c0]c3)= c3)
  grpolid(c0, c3, c2, (GId ` c0))
  eqid((GId ` c0))
  oveq2(c1, c3, c4, c0)
}

blocks.name: grpo2inv
blocks.content: Double inverse law for groups. Lemma 2.2.1(c) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpo2inv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgn, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1), wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, c1)))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, c1), cfv(cgi, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(cgi, c0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  grporinv(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c3, cfv(cgi, c0))
  grpolinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cgi, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  grpoinvcl(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2))
  grpoinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  grpolcan(c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2, c1, cfv(c3, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpo2inv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran(c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(inv ` c0)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1, ((c3 ` c1)[c0](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=((c3 ` c1)[c0]c1))
  eqtr4d(((c3 ` c1)[c0](c3 `(c3 ` c1))), ((c3 ` c1)[c0]c1), (GId ` c0), (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c3 ` c1)[c0](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=(GId ` c0), (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grporinv(c0, (c3 ` c1), c2, c3, (GId ` c0))
  grpolinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, (GId ` c0))
  eqid((GId ` c0))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, (((c3 ` c1)[c0](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=((c3 ` c1)[c0]c1)‚Üî(c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1), ((c3 `(c3 ` c1))‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3 ` c1)‚àà c2))
  3jca((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 `(c3 ` c1))‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 `(c3 ` c1))‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grpoinvcl(c0, (c3 ` c1), c2, c3)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2)
  grpoinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  grpolcan(c0, (c3 `(c3 ` c1)), c2, c1, (c3 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: grpoinvf
blocks.content: Mapping of the inverse function of a group. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm grpoinvf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgr), wf1o(c1, c2, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgn, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wcel(c0, cgr), wf1o(c1, c2, c2), wfn(c1, c2), wceq(crn(c1), c2), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  eqtr4d(crn(c1), c2, cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgr), wceq(crn(c1), cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))), wfn(c1, c2))
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, cgr), wfn(c1, c2), wfn(cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0)))), c2))
  fnmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0)))), c2, crio(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0))))
  riotaex(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0)))))
  fneq1d(c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, crio(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cgi, c0)))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  grpoinvfval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c0))
  fnrnfv(hs1, hs0, c1, c2)
  abbi2dv(hs1, c2, wcel(c0, cgr), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  impbid(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))

thm grpodivdiv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c0, co(c4, c5, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cgs, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c0, co(c4, c5, c3)), co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), co(c3, c5, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), co(c3, c5, c4)))), wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c2))
  grpodivcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  grpodivval(c0, c1, c2, co(c3, c5, c4), c5, cfv(cgn, c0))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c4, c5, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c4, c5, c3)))
  grpoinvdiv(c0, c3, c2, c4, cfv(cgn, c0), c5)

}

thm grpomuldivass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2))

  simpr2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3ad2antr3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4), c2))
  grpoinvcl(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cgn, c0))
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4))), wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2))
  grpocl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpodivval(c0, co(c1, c0, c3), c2, c4, c5, cfv(cgn, c0))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c4))))
  grpodivval(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cgn, c0))

blocks.name: grponpcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for group division. ( ~ npcan analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm grponpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c0, c3), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cgs, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c0, c3), c1, co(co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3)), c0, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(c1, c4, c3), c0, c3, co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  grpodivval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cgn, c0))
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3)), c0, c3), c1, co(c1, c0, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c0, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3)), c0, c3), co(c1, c0, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c0, c3))), wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c2))
  grpoinvcl(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cgn, c0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c3)
  eqtrd(co(c1, c0, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c0, c3)), c1, co(c1, c0, cfv(cgi, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c0, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c0, c3)), co(c1, c0, cfv(cgi, c0))))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, co(cfv(cfv(cgn, c0), c3), c0, c3), cfv(cgi, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c3, c2)))
  grpolinv(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cgn, c0), cfv(cgi, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgn, c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c0, cfv(cgi, c0)), c1))
  grporid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c1[c4]c3)[c0]c3)= c1)

  simp3(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)

  eqtrd((c1[c0](((inv ` c0)` c3)[c0]c3)), c1, (c1[c0](GId ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c0](((inv ` c0)` c3)[c0]c3))=(c1[c0](GId ` c0)))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, (((inv ` c0)` c3)[c0]c3), (GId ` c0), (c0 ‚àà GrpOp ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  grpolinv(c0, c3, c2, (inv ` c0), (GId ` c0))
  eqid((inv ` c0))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà GrpOp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c0](GId ` c0))= c1)
  grporid(c0, c1, c2, (GId ` c0))
